item.title: Run Azure images in Hyper-V or kvm
item.author: felix.niederwanger@suse.de (phoenix)
item.description: Disclaimer: This blog post is about SUSE Linux Enterprise Server images on Azure and probably only useful to SUSE Employees who work with such images.
